${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic

DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:Freelancer.NAME: Freelancer
${modID}:Freelancer.FLAVOR: The Freelancer embodies adaptability and mastery of diverse skills. Unbound by traditional roles.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start Combat with #yTrance. Its value persists between battles.
